```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(pROC)
```


```{r}
path <- "data/SiameseBERT"
list_dir <- c("batch128_m5_th1")
K <- 5
for(k in 1:K){
  
  data <- data.frame()
  
  for(dir in list_dir){
    
    DPATH <- paste0( c(path, dir, paste0("f", k), "best_model_predictions.csv"), collapse = '/' )
    
    D <- read.table(DPATH, header = T, sep = ',')
    roc <- roc_cdf <- roc(predictor = D$pwdist, response = D$y, levels = c('0', '1'), direction = '>')
    print(auc(roc))
  }

}

```
